long_description: The "little black dress" of sunglasses, the Oakley LBD Sunglasses for women offer retro glam along with modern eye protection that'll take you anywhere in style. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses. Lightweight, flexible nylon frames resist impact and stress. Turquoise frames have Black Grey Gradient lenses; Chocolate Sin frames have Dark Brown Gradient lenses. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp, accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that enhances the peripheral vision. Oakley LBD Sunglasses feature hydrophilic nose pads and earpads that become tackier when you perspire for a secure fit.
short_description: The "little black dress" of sunglasses, the Oakley LBD Sunglasses for women offer retro glam along with modern eye protection that'll take you anywhere in style.
